useCase.name: Collaboration with Faculty Members

preconditions.precondition: Researcher has access to the Repository Interface.

successEndConditions.condition: Researcher successfully selects faculty members for collaboration.

useCase.trigger: Researcher accesses the Repository Interface to collaborate with faculty members.

mainSequence.step: Repository Interface initiates a search for faculty members.
SearchSystem displays the results to the Researcher.
Researcher reviews faculty interests and expertise.
Repository Interface requests detailed information from FacultyProfiles.
FacultyProfiles provides detailed information to the Repository Interface.
Researcher selects faculty members for collaboration.
Repository Interface saves the selection for collaboration in CollaborationModule.
CollaborationModule confirms the selection and provides next steps to the Researcher.
